title: My Prayer for Jerry Falwell Jr., His Wife and the "Pool Boy" (Fixed sound)
description:
Jerry Falwell Jr.'s fall from power and elite status earned him condemnation from nearly all quarters in this cultural political war of words. Everyone reviles him now. Why? Is this evidence that a traditional sexual ethic is outdated and should be discarded? What should be the path forward for all parties? 



If you're looking for your comment on the old version with the bad sounds I unlisted it but you can still get to it at this link. https://youtu.be/jA8pqxIAeRk



 https://www.foxnews.com/us/giancarlo-granda-claims-falwell-jr-as-been-relentlessly-harassing-him-since-sex-scandal-broke

https://www.reuters.com/investigates/special-report/usa-falwell-relationship/

https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/falwell-says-hes-resigned-from-liberty-university/2020/08/25/54f81464-e739-11ea-bf44-0d31c85838a5_story.html

https://people.com/human-interest/jerry-falwell-jr-speaks-out-after-pool-boy-details-affair-wife/

https://nypost.com/2020/09/05/jerry-falwell-jr-s-family-made-millions-off-liberty-university/

https://nypost.com/2020/09/05/falwell-jr-s-disgrace-underscores-danger-of-institutional-capture/

https://nypost.com/2020/08/28/pool-boy-jerry-falwell-jr-told-me-to-go-for-it-with-wife/

https://nypost.com/2020/08/25/jerry-falwell-jr-wore-speedo-while-watching-wife-and-pool-boy-have-sex-accuser/

https://nypost.com/2020/09/05/jerry-falwell-jr-s-family-made-millions-off-liberty-university/
